title: Pre-Hardmode Anvils
info: The Iron Anvil and Lead Anvil (Pre-Hardmode anvils, collectively) are crafting stations used mainly to craft weapons and armor. Both anvils can craft the same items. Most of their recipes require metal bars, although they are also used to make other items, such as the Jungle tier of equipment. An anvil is a vital crafting station for most of the game, as it is used to make items from every tier up to Cobalt and Palladium, after which it must be replaced by a Mythril Anvil or Orichalcum Anvil.

stat.table:
Type
FurnitureCrafting station
Placeable (2 wide × 1 high)
Use time15 (Very fast)
TooltipUsed to craft items from metal bars
Rarity00*
Buy50
Sell10
Research1 required
